name: Chessboard Nim
overview: Chessboard Nim is a mathematical puzzle game played on a board resembling a chess or checker board. It was published as a type-in program in the 1983 book "Games Commodore 64 Computers Play" It was also released in The Netherlands under the name Schaakbord Nim in the Dutch version of the book, which was titled "Het Commodore 64 Computer-Spelen Boek" which came out a year later.
